Package exengine.datamodel

Class Rule

java.lang.Object
exengine.datamodel.Rule
public class Rule extends Object
The Rule class represents an automation rule in Home Assistant.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Rule

      public Rule(String ruleName, String ruleId, ArrayList<LogEntry> trigger, ArrayList<String> conditions, ArrayList<LogEntry> actions, String ownerId, String ruleDescription)
      Constructs a new Rule object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - the name of the rule
      ruleId - the ID of the rule
      trigger - the list of trigger log entries (Trigger also in Home Assistant)
      conditions - the list of conditions for the rule (Conditions in Home Assistant)
      actions - the list of actions to be performed when this rule is fired
      ownerId - the ID of the rule's owner
      ruleDescription - the description of the rule

    • getTrigger

      public ArrayList<LogEntry> getTrigger()
      Returns the list of trigger log entries for the rule.
      Returns:
      the list of trigger log entries (empty if no trigger exists)
